text: @SaraCarterDC @DrMarcSiegel @WHO WHO, along with CDC have been wrong about everything.  They are working with China and Big Pharma.  Coronavirus is a massive EXTORTION scheme to scare the populace into becoming dependent on new drugs that THEY will produce to save us from the diseases they created.
